description: Manage the durability of a cluster.

commands.name: az sf cluster durability update
commands.summary: Update the durability tier or VM SKU of a node type in the cluster.
commands.syntax:
az sf cluster durability update --cluster-name
                                --durability-level {Bronze, Gold, Silver}
                                --node-type
                                --resource-group
examples: az sf cluster durability update -g group-name -c cluster1 --durability-level Silver --node-type nt1
